title: Would this be boosting or bannable?
body:
So my partner and I want to get into ranked together so that we can climb, however there is a bit of a skill gap between us. I'm not Diamond or anything but there is a significant skill gap nonetheless. 

We do obviously lose some and win others (in norms), we aren't unbeatable nor would our ranked scores reflect such an ideal. I just want to know if I should wait until shes at the same level as I am or if it doesn't matter due to my only being silver on my main?

replies.body:
if you are just friends duo'ing, as long as you can play ranked together its fine.

The only time people get banned for boosting is when they let other people play on their account to be boosted.

Being boosted isnt banable anymore. 
Only bannable thing is saying mean words over the internetz.
